description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共新余市委第一书记、中共萍乡市委书记、江西省革命委员会副主任、江西省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as the First Secretary of the CPC Xinyu Municipal Committee, Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee, Vice Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee, and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党萍乡市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党萍乡市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省萍乡市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Pingxiang, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，李毅章的前任中共萍乡市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Li Yizhang's predecessor as the Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，李毅章的继任中共萍乡市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Li Yizhang's successor as the Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的河南省，是李毅章的出生地所在省份。
description.en: Henan Province during the Republic of China era, the province where Li Yizhang was born.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，李毅章的逝世地点。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Li Yizhang passed away.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省，是李毅章的出生地。
description.en: Located in Henan Province, China, it is the birthplace of Li Yizhang.

nodes.id: 中国共产党新余市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新余市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省新余市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Xinyu, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间江西省的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of Jiangxi Province during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 江西省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress.

en: Deputy to the 5th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第五届全国人民代表大会的代表，是最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: A deputy to the 5th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, a member of the highest state organ of power.

description.zh-cn: 李毅章是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Yizhang was a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党萍乡市委员会

description.zh-cn: 李毅章接替李开禄担任中共萍乡市委员会书记职务。
description.en: Li Yizhang succeeded Li Kailu as the Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 穆先接替李毅章担任中共萍乡市委员会书记职务。
description.en: Mu Xian succeeded Li Yizhang as the Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李毅章于1918年出生于河南偃师。
description.en: Li Yizhang was born in Yanshi, Henan in 1918.

relationships.target: 中国共产党新余市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在卸任中共萍乡市委书记后转任江西省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: After leaving his post as Secretary of the CPC Pingxiang Municipal Committee, he was transferred to the position of Vice Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会的任期为1978年3月至1983年6月。李毅章于1981年任内逝世。
description.en: The term of the 5th National People's Congress was from March 1978 to June 1983. Li Yizhang passed away in office in 1981.
